description: Add the onion and cook, stirring occasionally, for 6-8 minutes, or until softened.

Add the salt and pepper, taste and add a little more seasoning if you prefer. If using asparagus, place it on top of the risotto and cover the pan with a lid; cook for a further 3ï¿½4 minutes. Serve with an extra sprinkling of cracked black pepper.
Put the mushrooms, chard, oil, garlic, chilli, sea salt and half the sage leaves into a large roasting tin and mix well. Bake for 20 minutes.
